description.displayText: If you ask my son who his favorite person is, it's a close tie between Nancy and Mama. Nancy is the most incredible nanny I could have ever asked for. My family will always be forever grateful.
description.originalText: If you ask my son who his favorite person is, it's a close tie between Nancy and Mama. Nancy is the most incredible nanny I could have ever asked for. My family will always be forever grateful.

description.displayText:
We highly recommend Nancy, who worked us during my freelance project. She took excellent care of my 9 month old N. and picks up R. (3.5) from preschool. 

Nancy is detail oriented, calm, kind, reliable, thorough, and has great problem solving skills. As a native Chinese speaker (Cantonese and Mandarin,) she primarily speak to my kids in Cantonese at our request. She also is fluent in English and easily communicates with non-Chinese speakers. My kids always look forward to seeing her. Baby N. is too young to speak, but she always smiles when she sees Nancy and my son sometimes doesn't want her to go home.
 
When she first started, N. refused taking the bottle, and now she only takes the bottle from Nancy, not even my husband or her grandparents.
 
Nancy is comfortable working with children of various ages, from newborns to preschooler. She treats our kids like her own. She has two sons herself, which speaks a lot of her own experience.

description.displayText: Lai Na is a wonderful caregiver. She worked for us for 14 months, speaking only Chinese to our two boys. She took the kids to their after-school activities and made sure homework was done. She bought groceries, cooked dinner for the whole family, kept the house, did laundry--basically ran our household. Nancy is a wonderful asset for any family.
